meanings.definition: A type of mite that infests honeybees.
meanings.sent1: The varroas were causing harm to the honeybees in the hive.
meanings.sent2: The beekeeper had to take action to control the varroas infestation.
meanings.sent3: The varroas seemed to be having a party on the bees, but it was definitely unwelcome.
meanings.sent4: The varroas were like tiny invaders attacking the bee kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The varroas multiplied rapidly, threatening the bee population.
